embed.description:
Your temporary email address is: 
`%{prefix}@%{domain}`
 
You can use it to sign up for websites and services that require an email address to verify your account. 
 
To get a new email address, type </tempmail:1040258345812119624>.
embed.description-locked:
Your temporary email address `%{prefix}@%{domain}` is locked. If you have the password, press the button below to unlock it. 
 
If you don't have the password, type </tempmail:1040258345812119624> to get a new email address.

mails.select: Select a mail to read it

unlock_pass.success: Your temporary email address is now unlocked. You can use it to sign up for websites and services that require an email address to verify your account.
unlock_pass.failed: The password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.

set_pass.success: Your temporary email address is now locked. You can use it to sign up for websites and services that require an email address to verify your account.
set_pass.failed: Something went wrong. Please try again.

subject.label: Subject
subject.placeholder: Enter the subject of the email

text.label: Email text
text.placeholder: Enter the text of the email

send_email.failed: Something went wrong. Please try again.
